reviews.review: so many loose-ends that need to be tied up
It's an alright expansion but it doesn't really warrant its own game. It should be packaged with Episode 1 but it's still a fun chapter in the Half-Life universe.
Valve we need three right now!

Great Game after I found out how to stop the screen from freezing on the start page with the super portal. To those that have this happen, enter "-dxlevel 81." No quotations, or period. I know, it looks shady, I thought the same thing, but have you seen anyone trying to help in guides? Or even overall online? No, or at least I hadn't. I just hope you have as fun of a time as myself in the game. Have a good game!

典型的 Valve 風格，這游戲時刻在提醒著玩家這是在游戲。所以即使劇情有黑暗元素，也還是覺得是小孩子過家家。。。

但游戲性一流。

我衹能祈禱這個系列能延續下去。。。
erano altri tempi! .... e che tempi!

Bugged and not a proper ending... overall the series is great with a shotgun being my favorite weapon...  ran into several bugs where walking backwards in a tunnel teleported my kin into space.. i guess the g-man just wants me to dive head first into a vat of poison.  Valve... update and create a frikin sequal.  The vame is amazing but the consistancy of wondering about the sequals and how survivors still have beer after 30 some years of oppression and consistency of gman fing us in from behind while we abide to his tasks.  With the war we see eli age 30 years.... his daughter whom was alive during black mesa only looks 26...why valve? Why?
Buena historia, aún esperando el tercer episodio.

Valve, this is cruel. You made an amazing game with an amazing story... But wait! You didn't show us everything, you left a hole in the story. Now that's not nice. You really should make Half-life 3 no matter what! Gamers around the world need it, we need to know rest the of the story. So please, make Half-life 3!

Не вижу смысла писать, что игра хорошая... Достойное дополнение, достойной игры... Но не знаю. Только у меня или нет, ночасть диалогов проглатывается, то есть не закончив фразу персонажи говорят другой. В обоих дополнениях. И в конце этого эпизода Алекс начала говорить на англ. яз. Общее впечатление отигры не портится, ноо касяки есть.
Это Half-Life...

El mejor de los mejores juegos, pues es la parte final de la saga de Half-Life, ya que todo parece haber terminado pero no es asi :'v, todos esperamos una tercera parte :'v y bueno nada mas que decir que EPICO, y genial, igual continuando la historia, ¿Como puedes hacer esto Valve? :'v

Знайте что Valve? Идите ка вы в задницу. Была отличная номинация "Игра, которая заслуживает продолжение", но нет. Вместо того, что бы что то по этому поводу сказать, вы просто убирайте серию халф-лайф из номинантов. Я устал ждать, я устал каждый день выискивать новые новости или утечки каких то файлов типо "Penkaotpivanapodborodgebarneyhl3rpg.txt". А игру советую. Эта игра сделала мое детство лучшим. Даже не знаю, как бы я без нее жил.
Can I have a sequel yet please? Pretty Please? I'll be your best friend......

Good God this needs a sequel. GabeN, can you not hear the desperate cries of steam users begging for Half-Life 2 ep. 3 or HL3? Do it, GabeN. Do it for the good of the people. Actually, this is a very good game, go buy it now if you don't have it already. I sure hope it wins an award in the steam awards thingy, but I also want that badge sooo... Anyway, this game is what story-based/influenced FPS' are about. Would recommend, rating 2.9/3.

Hace un año, empecé a ver Twin Peaks, la serie de David Lynch. Justo cuando terminé el capítulo final, Lynch anunciaba el regreso de Twin Peaks después de 25 años de su cancelación. Es decir, que mucha gente entregó sus esperanzas al vacío de no ver jamás una resolución, mucha gente murió incluso, actores incluidos. Yo sólo tengo que esperar unos meses más.

Lo mismo espero con la llegada de Half Life 3. Lo mismo espero...
This is like one of the best games (and sequel to a sequal of a game) I've ever played! Exelent content added and still has that same amazingness of the previus games, a must get!
